Я знал, что два какие-то фильтра включенных могут друг с другом конфликтовать и реклама будет проходить, но на этот раз вообще ничего не помогает. ``` ### Screenshots

issue.title: m.gx.cn
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

5.1.102

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.gx.cn/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, EasyPrivacy, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter, Fanboy's Social Blocking List

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### Other

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals

### Add your comment and screenshots

>[!Note]
> 这个广告怀疑跳转的链接为NSFW内容，我无法确定所以加上了

# 描述
一部分网站没法屏蔽我忍了，而很明显的广告都屏蔽不了，你们过滤库存的都是些啥啊？好好写代码很难吗？一堆垃圾东西呼我脸上把我都搞破防，要不是人在国内我都想把这广告分享给你们看了话说到这里，下面供上截图

# 截图
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9a3217a3-ebfe-48b3-9571-4b4c13dd9c97

</details>

# 解决方案
可以加上下面的过滤条文：
```
##.index-ad
##.index-ad
```



### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to update the filters (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

5.1.102

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.gx.cn/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, EasyPrivacy, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter, Fanboy's Social Blocking List

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### Other

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals

### Add your comment and screenshots

>[!Note]
> 这个广告怀疑跳转的链接为NSFW内容，我无法确定所以加上了

# 描述
一部分网站没法屏蔽我忍了，而很明显的广告都屏蔽不了，你们过滤库存的都是些啥啊？好好写代码很难吗？一堆垃圾东西呼我脸上把我都搞破防，要不是人在国内我都想把这广告分享给你们看了话说到这里，下面供上截图

# 截图
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9a3217a3-ebfe-48b3-9571-4b4c13dd9c97

</details>

# 解决方案
可以加上下面的过滤条文：
```
##.index-ad
##.index-ad
```



### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
I don't see any statistics for the website, so can't add any rules to our filters. Please add these rules to user rules or you can add the mentioned one. I'll also write to the author of Easylist China about it.
```adblock
||m.gx.cn/img/*.gif
m.gx.cn###html-box-AD
```

5.1.102

Desktop

Send Do-Not-Track signals

>[!Note]

# 描述
一部分网站没法屏蔽我忍了，而很明显的广告都屏蔽不了，你们过滤库存的都是些啥啊？好好写代码很难吗？一堆垃圾东西呼我脸上把我都搞破防，要不是人在国内我都想把这广告分享给你们看了话说到这里，下面供上截图

# 截图
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9a3217a3-ebfe-48b3-9571-4b4c13dd9c97

</details>

# 解决方案
可以加上下面的过滤条文：
```
##.index-ad
##.index-ad
```

AdGuard for Windows ### AdGuard version 7.20.3 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed analytics or tracker ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? mediamarkt.de ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter, EasyList ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots #### List the website(s) you're having issues with: `mediamarkt.de` #### What happens? ### Issue URL (Ads) [https://mail.yandex.ru/?ncrnd=68336&uid=897569817#inbox](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.yandex.ru%2F%3Fncrnd%3D68336%26uid%3D897569817%23inbox) ### Comment > Программа тормозит, слишком часто (каждые полчаса) приводит в сбою браузера и зависанию компьютера. Пропускает много рекламы на разных сайтах, хотя было 12 фильтров. ничего не менялось - это после обновления Адгвард 14 июня 2025. > Новый интерфейс неудобный - не видно, что. где и сколько включено. > Реклама в почте Гугл и Яндекс чувствует себя прекрасно, Адгвард её не ограничивает, ограничивает только мой компьютер. ### Screenshots
